trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade básica para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> replace and add functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> substituam e adicionem funcionalidade ao controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> de versões anteriores, o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e uso futuro, se desejado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, providing necessary painting and layout properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> é a classe base para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, fornecendo os métodos e propriedades necessárias de pintura e layout.

trans-unit.source: The properties of this class that you are most likely to use directly are the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> properties, which determine whether the shortcut menu will be able to display a check mark, an image, or both.
trans-unit.target: São as propriedades dessa classe que provavelmente usar diretamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> propriedades que determinam se o menu de atalho poderá exibir uma marca de seleção, uma imagem ou ambos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> control by setting the check and image margins.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar e inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> controle definindo as margens de verificação e imagem.

trans-unit.source: This code is not a complete sample so it will not compile.
trans-unit.target: Esse código não é um exemplo completo não será compilado.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Enable Check Margins and Image Margins in ContextMenuStrip Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-enable-check-margins-and-image-margins-in-contextmenustrip-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: habilitar margens de verificação e margens de imagem em controles ContextMenuStrip](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-enable-check-margins-and-image-margins-in-contextmenustrip-controls.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar e inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> controle.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Enable Check Margins and Image Margins in ContextMenuStrip Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-enable-check-margins-and-image-margins-in-contextmenustrip-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: habilitar margens de verificação e margens de imagem em controles ContextMenuStrip](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-enable-check-margins-and-image-margins-in-contextmenustrip-controls.md).

trans-unit.source: The text to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser usado para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <c>text</c> parameter is a hyphen (-), this method creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o parâmetro <c>text</c> for um hífen (-), esse método criará um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> recebe um clique.

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> with the specified text, image, and event handler on a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> padrão com o texto, a imagem e o manipulador de eventos especificados em um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />, or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" /> if the <paramref name="text" /> parameter is a hyphen (-).
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> ou um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" /> se o parâmetro <paramref name="text" /> for um hífen (-).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.CreateDefaultItem%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> with commonly used characteristics to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.CreateDefaultItem%2A> método para adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> com comumente usado características para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento interno, em pixels, do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Padding" /> object representing the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Padding" /> objeto que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo que representa a área de exibição do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display area.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a área de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Passes a reference to the cached <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine" /> returned by the layout engine interface.
trans-unit.target: Passa uma referência para o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine" /> armazenado em cache retornado pela interface do mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> that represents the cached layout engine returned by the layout engine interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> que representa o mecanismo de layout em cache retornado pela interface do mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the items of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como os itens de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> items flow horizontally or vertically as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> itens de fluem horizontal ou verticalmente conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> enumeration for the other possibilities.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> enumeração para as outras possibilidades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum height and width, in pixels, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura e a largura máximas, em pixels, do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Size" /> object representing the height and width of the control, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Size" /> objeto que representa a altura e largura do controle, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.FontChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.FontChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnFontChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnFontChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnFontChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnLayout%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnLayout%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Colore a tela de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Resets the collection of displayed and overflow items after a layout is done.
trans-unit.target: Redefine a coleção de itens exibidos e de estouro após a conclusão de um layout.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether space for a check mark is shown on the left edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o espaço para uma marca de seleção é exibido na borda esquerda do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the check margin is shown; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a margem de seleção for exibida. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A> property to `true` to display a check mark when the user chooses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowCheckMargin%2A> propriedade `true` para exibir uma marca de seleção quando o usuário escolhe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> control by setting the check and image margins.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar e inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> controle definindo as margens de verificação e imagem.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Enable Check Margins and Image Margins in ContextMenuStrip Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-enable-check-margins-and-image-margins-in-contextmenustrip-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: habilitar margens de verificação e margens de imagem em controles ContextMenuStrip](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-enable-check-margins-and-image-margins-in-contextmenustrip-controls.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether space for an image is shown on the left edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o espaço para uma imagem é mostrado na borda esquerda do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the image margin is shown; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a margem da imagem é exibida; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> property to `true` to display a graphic image with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> propriedade `true` para exibir uma imagem de gráfico com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> control by setting the check and image margins.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar e inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> controle definindo as margens de verificação e imagem.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Enable Check Margins and Image Margins in ContextMenuStrip Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-enable-check-margins-and-image-margins-in-contextmenustrip-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: habilitar margens de verificação e margens de imagem em controles ContextMenuStrip](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-enable-check-margins-and-image-margins-in-contextmenustrip-controls.md).
